.design

UI/IxD/Visual Design

In my experience as a digital designer, I would deliver a scalable presentation layer (SCSS/CSS) along with visual designs and specifications. I enjoy bouncing back-and-forth from VSC to Figma, developing and designing reusable and flexible assets as well as the development of tokenized styles with Amazon's Style Dictionary.

Front end design & platform implementation

I tend to do my most effective designing in-browser. I hold a strong understanding of how a brand’s visual styles can be translated into a scalable and adaptive presentation framework (SCSS/CSS). For 10 years I have collaborated with and advised global teams on the design and build of web applications for B2B, data & analytics, and digital marketing. I worked as part of a team that leveraged Adobe Experience Manage. With AEM's style system, I've developed multi-product style and theme strategies that support the business and AEM authoring requirements.
